page.title: 17FARMING
page.content: {The Largest Farms}.Church and Manor Farm owned by father and son,has about 600 acres with 100 acres Ministry of Defence land on the airfield,March to September tenancy.There are about 500 cattle.Yarded 102 barley beef bulls.Culled dairy cows are bought in to fatten.A single suckler herd is run with Charolais,Limousin, & Belgian Blue bulls.63 acres is ensiled for direct feeding,45 due for second cut.108 ewes bought as two toothed, run with 2 rams,lambed from January to May,lambs sold off fat.Some hay is made,home grown cereal is milled and mixed.Approximately half the acreage is arable,with high application of fertilisers and sprays.Outside contractors assist harvest rape, combining,spraying,round baling. Corn is stored in 3 X 450 tonnes and 1 X 250 tonnes silos.(3 employed + OAP )
